body:
With cuda 8 and 9.0 installed, setting `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` in `.bashrc` and `.profile` not work. So, I set 
`LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64` in pycharm Environment variable field and it works.
